item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-25
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Acapulcos in Beverly (900 Cumming Center, Beverly). #
  • Anyone on Comcast not seeing the farm 4 Flickr servers? Most pics from Flickr aren't showing up. #
  • Happy birthday to my beautiful wife! (@ckirsten) #
  • I'm at The Deluxe Town Diner (627 Mt Auburn St, Bigelow, Watertown). #
  • RT: At Deluxe Town Diner waiting to get pancakes (via @ckirsten) #
  • I'm at Uncommon Grounds. #
  • I'm at LL Bean Legacy Place. #
  • Checking out Legacy Place in Dedham. Only LL Bean is open now, but when the rest of the stores open next month it should be pretty awesome. #
  • LL Bean @ Legacy Place #
  • RT: Who is living like a Nomad? great article and trend to be watched! (via @garyvee) #
  • Chicken, cheese & shredded beef enchiladas @ Acapulcos #
  • Jo'nny Cakes w/ blueberries & bacon @ Deluxe Town Diner #
  • Repeatedly submitting a comic book concept we're not interested in isn't going to make us publish it. We'll just mark you as spam. #tip #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
